UserProfile.Description: From the age of 11 until 31 August after your 16th birthday, you can pay child fares if you have an igo card.

SaleDiscountRight.Name: 16 Plus Card
SaleDiscountRight.Description: he 16Plus photocard is available to anyone aged between 16 and 21, entitling the holder to discounted travel on Arriva bus services in Merseyside and Lancashire for 1 year (£1.80 flat fare, single trip).

UserProfile.Name: Infant
UserProfile.Description: Children under 5 years old travel for free on buses in Greater Manchester.

UserProfile.Name: Child
UserProfile.Description: If you are aged 5-11 you can pay child fares on buses in Greater Manchester. From the age of 11 until 31 August after your 16th birthday, you can pay child fares if you have an igo card.

SalesOfferPackage.Description: Day Return trip Travel in a given ArrivaSingleTrip zone. Can be bought onboar. Youth and child Tickets available.
